songs.title: Boyfriend (Live)
songs.lyrics:
[Verse 1]
When I was your girl, you always let me go
I took you places you ain't been before
Said, "Take a chance, or you'll never know"
Cause you had money in your hands that you had to blow

[Pre-Chorus]
Boyfriend, boyfriend
You could be my boyfriend
Could've been my boy, till the world ends
I'd like to be everything you want
Hey boy, lemme talk to you

[Chorus]
When I was your girlfriend
You always let me go
Kept me on your arm boy
So you weren't left alone
You could've been a better man
Anytime you want
But when I was your girlfriend
I always felt alone
I always felt alone

[Verse 2]
You tell me what you like, tell me what you don't
You were my life
We flew across the globe
And I, I don't like to fight
And you already know
But you, you, you made me bright
Like the winter snow

[Pre-Chorus]
Boyfriend, boyfriend
You could be my boyfriend
Could've been my boy, till the world ends
I'd like to be everything you want
Hey boy, lemme talk to you

[Chorus]
'Cause when I was your girlfriend
You always let me go
Kept me on your arm boy
So you weren't left alone
You could've been a better man
Anytime you want
But when I was your girlfriend
I always felt alone
I always felt alone

[Bridge]
I gave you a chance
You're all I needed boy
Spent a month with me, boy, never calling me your girlfriend
If you were my man, I'd never leave you boy
But you won't ever love or treat me right
Hee-hee, hee
Hee-hee, hee
Right, right
Hee-hee, hee

[Chorus] [2x]
When I was your girlfriend
You always let me go
Kept me on your arm boy
So you weren't left alone
You could've been a better man
Anytime you want
'Cause when I was your girlfriend
I always felt alone
I always felt alone
